comment: Great guy. Super funny and helpful. I would definitely take again. He is very knowledgeable on machining and welding, however, his study guides are not completely like the test.

If I could do it again I would try and take someone else. I'm not sure who though. Boring lectures(just reads out of book), disappointing class. Mr. Jordan dosen't seem to have any kind of schedule for the material (We spent 3 just weeks in the machining lab) My advise, take the class that meets more than once per week.

This Professor is not that bad...He is very slow talking his lectures are pretty much nap time but lab is interesting he is always there to help. His lectures test are not clear study guide says one thing tests are another but in all he is cool crack jokes and understand his students on a personal basis

A beyond good professor. He is VERY VERY helpful. He is also very nice and really funny. He will help you with anything and is probably the most helpful teacher of all time. He's great at what he does and loves teaching about it. I would take him again if I could.
